body.p: While I was Comth Atto. I had Elijah Perry fined ^in the Bath Circuit^ at the same Court twice, $50 Each time, for selling liquor to Minors and once $20 for retailing out of his house he is a poor Ignorant old man as harmless as a man can be these fines will, take, bread out of his childrens mouths if, he is made to pay them, I am certain you should remit them and I hope you will,
Gov. please remit these fines We are satisfied, it should be done,

Daniel Harper
J. H. Richard
E. V. Brother
R. Coutthard
Wm Robins
John.E. Price
H J Leg
I could get this sheet full of names but, it would not make it any better

Respectfully
Jno M Witt
Bath County

p.hi: Write to him to send the date of the Judgments & they will be Remitted
